In England, in the seven days to 19 March, there were 31,328 new confirmed cases (55.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 March, there were 33,117 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 5% (1,789 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 March is 3,773,224 (6,703.5 cases per 100,000 population).
